content:
Sure, here are 20 popular Puerto Rican food trucks in the US:

1. The Empanada Lady - New Jersey
2. La Chimi - New York City
3. Sofrito Mama's - New York City
4. El Jibarito - Orlando, Florida
5. Kiosko Latino - Chicago, Illinois
6. Piñones En Orlando - Orlando, Florida
7. Los Chilangos - Los Angeles, California
8. Puerto Rico on Wheels - Maryland/DC area
9. La Isla Bonita - Seattle, Washington
10. La Placita - Miami, Florida
11. Pura Vida - Portland, Oregon
12. The Rolling Elvii - Atlanta, Georgia
13. The Mofongo King - Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
14. Borinquen Lunch Box - New Haven, Connecticut
15. La Sonrisa - San Francisco, California
16. La Vida - Portland, Oregon
17. Casa Borinquen - St. Paul, Minnesota
18. Latin Fixins - Indianapolis, Indiana
19. El Coquí - Boston, Massachusetts
20. Mi Rinconcito Mexicano - Las Vegas, Nevada (also serves Puerto Rican cuisine)
